arts.ttl: Neil Critchley responds to Hearts fan boycott as cheeky chant from St Johnstone end met with timely silencer
arts.sum: The Gorgie ultras boycotted the game as Hearts picked up a much-needed home win

arts.ttl: Tannadice stalemate & vital win for Hearts
arts.sum: Reaction as Celtic held by Dundee Utd at Tannadice plus a huge win for Neil Critchley.

arts.ttl: Hearts climb off foot of Premiership table with victory over St Johnstone
arts.sum: The Jambos leapfrogged the Perth side and Ross County to move into 10th place after victory at Tynecastle.

arts.ttl: Hearts ultras boycott St Johnstone clash in protest against Tynecastle board
arts.sum: The Gorgie Ultras have left their usual section behind the goals at Tynecastle empty for bottom of the table clash.

arts.ttl: Hearts data analysis of Neil Critchley makes for grim reading and his number is up on noxious Tynecastle tenure
arts.sum: Record Sport's Michael Gannon felt Critchley was an ill fit from the start and wonders what analytics has him as top choice

arts.ttl: Lawrence Shankland fires back at Hearts boo boys after Euro shocker claiming 'it doesn't help'
arts.sum: The crisis-hit Jambos crashed out of Europe to Moldovan minnows Petrocub in front of a seething Tynecastle on Thursday.
